trans-unit.source: Defines constants that indicate whether content is copied from a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control to the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 定义常数，指示是否将内容从 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 控件复制到剪贴板。

trans-unit.source: This enumeration is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ClipboardCopyMode%2A> property to indicate whether users can copy the text values of selected cells to the Clipboard and whether row and column header text is included.
trans-unit.target: 此枚举由<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ClipboardCopyMode%2A>属性以指示用户是否可以选定的单元格的文本值复制到剪贴板以及是否包括行和列标题文本。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to enable copying in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何启用复制中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: For the complete example, see [How to: Enable Users to Copy Multiple Cells to the Clipboard from the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/enable-users-to-copy-multiple-cells-to-the-clipboard-datagridview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关完整示例，请参阅[如何： 启用用户添加到复制到剪贴板从 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的多个单元](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/enable-users-to-copy-multiple-cells-to-the-clipboard-datagridview.md)。

trans-unit.source: Copying to the Clipboard is disabled.
The text values of selected cells can be copied to the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 可以将所选单元格的文本值复制到剪贴板。

trans-unit.source: Header text is included for rows and columns that contain selected cells.
trans-unit.target: 为所选单元格所在的行和列包含标题文本。

trans-unit.source: The text values of selected cells can be copied to the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 可以将所选单元格的文本值复制到剪贴板。

trans-unit.source: Row or column header text is included for rows or columns that contain selected cells only when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode" /> property is set to <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode.RowHeaderSelect" /> or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode.ColumnHeaderSelect" /> and at least one header is selected.
trans-unit.target: 仅当 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode" /> 属性设置为 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode.RowHeaderSelect" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode.ColumnHeaderSelect" />，并且至少选择了一个标题时，才为所选单元格所在的行或列包含行或列标题文本。

trans-unit.source: The text values of selected cells can be copied to the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 可以将所选单元格的文本值复制到剪贴板。
